divs: Sighting Detailsi was at school at recess.my friend.the moon.it looked like the moon but brighter and the moon was on the other side of the sky.it started to cover the sun[it was next to it when i spotted it].i told all the teachers.i went inside.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Alvin
There were no other sightings in Alvin on or around March 19th 2005
Summary: it was a bright light next to the sun
